DOC.brief_title: Appearance Plasma Amino Acids Following Consumption Oral Nutrition Supplement
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject ( absence metabolic disorder , heart disease , endocrine disease , cancer ) Discontinued use omega 3 fatty acid supplement 10 day prior test Willing provide sign informed consent Smoker Patients potential noncompliance Patients allergy ingredient test product ( i.e . milk protein , fish oil ) Subject Investigator 's assessment expect comply study protocol Currently participate another conflict clinical trial .
